title: URBN BY MODERN HOME FINISHINGS Simple Metal Wall Mount Sports Medal Hanger and Lanyard Ribbon Display Holder Rack with 20 Easy Hanging Hooks & Easy Install, Great Gift
features: Heavy Duty and High Quality Metal Medal Hanger Holder in a black matte finish, with 20 easy to hang hooks. Simple and modern design.
No Assembly required. Simple installation instructions and mounting hardware included.
20 Hooks allow for easy hanging of lanyard style medals, or can be used as a holder for jewelry, keys, leashes, hats, sunglasses etc.
Great holder to display ribbon medals for the sports enthusiast, kids as well as adults. Also, a great organizer and display for anyone with a love for jewelry like necklaces and bangles.
description: Keeping it simple and minimalistic with this medal hanger. Easy to display and hang your medals on this metal medal hanger display. This sturdy metal frame holder is a great way to proudly show off your hard work and accomplishments. With it's simple design, this hanger can be used to display case your ribbon medal trophy collections from a variety of sporting events such as running races like 5K, Marathons or Half Marathons; Swimming; Tennis; Basketball; Karate; Martial Arts; Soccer; Baseball; etc. Not only is the hanger great for medals, its universal designed hooks can be used to hang other items like jewelry, keys, pet leashes, hats and so on. Use it in the home or the office, for yourself or as a gift. The display includes hanging hardware and installation instructions.Note: The medals or ribbons shown on the pictures do not come with the hanger.
